import React, { useState } from 'react' import {Tab,Nav} from 'react-bootstrap' import Conversation from './Conversation' import Contact from './Contact' const conversations_key="conversations" const contacts_key="contacts" function Sidebar({id}) { const[activeKey,setActiveKey]=useState(conversations_key); return (
ConverSations Contacts
Your Id:{id}
) } export default Sidebar
